titles.title: Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reauthorize the juvenile accountability block grants program through fiscal year 2014.
Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2009 - Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to extend through FY2014 the authorization of appropriations for the juvenile accountability block grant program.
